word: God has given us all that we possess. It all belongs to him, and we are not to sit at the foot stool of any man to obey his orders; for God has made us free moral agents. He requires us to preserve our moral independence, and not be bound about by any man. Our consciences are to be controlled by no power on earth. The Holy Spirit will work upon minds if we will hearken to its faintest whispers. It is the voice of your Advocate in the heavenly courts.
